prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that resembles an ancient sarcophagus with eerie features.
I want a spooky Pokemon with a spooky design and mysterious powers.
Generate a ghostly creature that embodies the essence of an Egyptian tomb.
Make a Pokemon that has the ability to confuse opponents with its spectral presence.
Imagine a Pokemon that serves as a guardian of ancient secrets hidden in tombs.
Design a ghost-type Pokemon that's known for haunting ancient ruins with its eerie aura.
Show me a Pokemon with a unique design that makes it stand out in ghostly battles.
